sentences.en: A good insulation around the cement favours an temperature increase.
sentences.cn: 水泥周围的良绝热体又有利于温度的增高.

sentences.en: A wet suit provides excellent insulation.
sentences.cn: 湿式潜水服有极佳的隔热性能。

sentences.en: At times clothing has been credited with properties far beyond that of a simple thermal insulation.
sentences.cn: 有时,服装所具有的特性已远远超过了简单的保暖性能.

sentences.en: Better insulation of your home will help to reduce heating bills.
sentences.cn: 增加房子的隔热性能会有助于减少供暖费用。

sentences.en: Every insulation must be evaluated for light transmission characteristics.
sentences.cn: 每一种绝热系统都必须根据光传递系统加以评价.
泡沫橡胶隔绝性能良好.

sentences.en: Good insulation can save you money on heating bills.
sentences.cn: 好的隔热效果能节省暖气费。

sentences.en: High electricity bills point to a poor heating system or bad insulation.
sentences.cn: 高额电费开支说明供暖系统不足或建筑隔热材料不良。

sentences.en: It is always difficult to assure good insulation between the electric leads.
sentences.cn: 要保证两个电触头之间有良好的绝缘总是很困难的.

sentences.en: Physically it is impossible to have complete thermal insulation between two media.
sentences.cn: 从物理学上讲,两种介质之间不可能有完全的绝热.

sentences.en: Please examine the insulation of the electric wires in my house.
sentences.cn: 请检查一下我屋子里电线的绝缘情况.

sentences.en: The insulation must be protected from moisture.
There was at least a five - layer insulation to their level.
sentences.cn: 在他们那个顶层下面至少还有五个绝缘层.

sentences.en: These electrons cannot pass into the phototube because of the insulation on the metal plate.
sentences.cn: 由于金属板上的绝缘层,这些电子并不能进入电光管.

sentences.en: They lived in happy insulation from brutal facts.
sentences.cn: 他们幸福地生活在不受残酷现实干扰的世界里。

sentences.en: This can be counteracted only by very effective insulation.
sentences.cn: 这只能用非常有效的绝缘来防止.

words.tran_cn: 孤立的；与世隔绝的；海岛的；岛民的
[物] 绝缘体；从事绝缘工作的工人
隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热

phrases.tran_cn: 电气绝缘；电绝缘材料，绝缘体

trans.tran_cn: 隔离，孤立，绝缘，绝缘或隔热的材料，隔声
trans.tran_en: when something is insulated or someone insulates something
